articles.title: Cut Supply to Lionel Messi, Paraguay Players Told Ahead of FIFA World Cup Qualifiers
articles.description: Paraguay will focus on cutting supply to Argentina captain Lionel Messi when the teams meet in a 2022 FIFA World Cup qualifier, head coach Eduardo Berizzo has said.

articles.title: Brazil, Argentina Face Tests As WCup Qualifying Resumes
articles.description: SAO PAULO: Brazil and Argentina will be hoping to actually finish their games this time when World Cup qualifying resumes Thursday across South America.
articles.content:
SAO PAULO: Brazil and Argentina will be hoping to actually finish their games this time when World Cup qualifying resumes Thursday across South America.

articles.title: Argentine farmers close deals for 31 mln tonnes of 2020/21 soy - ministry
articles.description: BUENOS AIRES, Oct 5 (Reuters) - Farmers in Argentina have sold 31 million tonnes of soybeans from the 2020/21 season after transactions for 464,200 tonnes were recorded over the last week, the Agriculture Ministry said on Tuesday in a report with data updated through Sept.

articles.title: Two stranded humpback whales rescued in Argentina
articles.description: Rescue teams saved two stranded whales along the Atlantic coast of Argentina Tuesday, the World Marine Foundation said.
articles.content: Rescue teams saved two stranded whales along the Atlantic coast of Argentina Tuesday, the World Marine Foundation said. The animals were stranded on the beach of the seaside resort town of La Lucila del Mar, 220 miles (360 kilometers) south of Buenos... [1931 chars]

articles.title: SAFF Championship: India held to 1-1 draw by 10-man Bangladesh in opener
articles.description: Sunil Chhetri (76) is now fourth in the list of highest goal-scorers among active players, behind Portugal's Cristiano Ronaldo (111), Argentina's Lionel Messi (79) and Iraq's Ali Mabkhout (77).
articles.content:
India allowed a 10-man Bangladesh to come back and score a shock goal after talismanic captain Sunil Chhetri’s 76th international strike to play out a 1-1 draw in their SAFF Championships opener here on Monday.

articles.title: Differences in Giving Birth Between US and Argentina
articles.description: The author said she felt more taken care of after delivering her baby in Argentina than she did after delivering in the US.
articles.content:
I felt unseen while giving birth in the US. No one was paying attention to what I needed.
In Argentina, about a dozen people were waiting for me in the recovery room, which felt chaotic.
My C-section scar in Argentina was delicate. I would even call ... [4272 chars]

articles.description: Argentina star Messi smacked the crossbar with a free-kick in the first half at Roazhon Park before Gaetan Laborde volleyed Rennes ahead just before the break with his league-leading sixth goal.

articles.title: Rugby-Weary Pumas need rest says Ledesma after Argentina struggle
articles.description: The Pumas went into the game on the Gold Coast without six players who were sidelined for breaching pandemic protocols on an unsanctioned day trip to Byron Bay. With injuries and fatigue taking their toll on a weary Argentina side that has not played a home test in two years, a makeshift team went on to lose 32-17 to the Wallabies.
articles.content: Argentina endured a difficult finish to a challenging Rugby Championship on Saturday with defeat at the hands of Australia, but coach Mario Ledesma praised the character shown by his team at the end of an arduous tour. The Pumas went into the game on... [1904 chars]
